701619f-a.text:
(1)
Pelham Parkway South (running from left to right), at the S.E. corner of White Plains Road, showing excavation work in progress. On the left appears the elevated station of the
I.R.T. White Plains Road subway line.
July 28, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, as seen from the street.
July 28, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
701619f-a.folder: Pelham Parkway South & White Plains Road, Bronx, NY
701619f-a.original_title: Bronx: Pelham Parkway South - White Plains Road

701619f-b.text:
(1)
Pelham Parkway South (running from left to right), at the S.E. corner of White Plains Road, showing excavation work in progress. On the left appears the elevated station of the

701619f-b.folder: Pelham Parkway South & White Plains Road, Bronx, NY
701619f-b.original_title: Bronx: Pelham Parkway South - White Plains Road

702146f-c.text:
(1)
2181 Wiite Plains Road, west side, between Pelham Parkway South and Lydig Ave. It is situated on the former John Jacob Astor
Estate.
July 27, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
A view of the south side of the house as seen from Bolton Street. Also shown is a portion of the elevated structure of the I.R.T.
Pelham Bay Park subway line.
July 28, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
Gate and wagon drive-in to the house, slightly to the south of
it.
July 27, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
